concept.title: Event Serialization
concept.shortdesc: Event serialization prevents duplicate events from being reported in analytics. Duplication can commonly occur when a user refreshes a page multiple times, or navigates to a certain page multiple times, or saves the web page to their device. For example, some users save the purchase confirmation page to their device. Every time they view it, orders and revenue would be counted again if event serialization was not in place).

conbody.p: See Event Serialization in implementation help.
